==== Pidgin ====

Pidgin is the default Instant Messaging client for gnome.  It relies on the libpurple backend.

'''Tests to perform'''

** Setup and account (MSN,Hotmail,google talk, Aol IM, all require online account before you start).
** Login to Irc. Join #ubuntu-testing say hello.
** Log off and log back on.
** Try send a file.
** Test the smilies
